title: 07/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises the Milwaukee Bucks for winning the NBA Finals last night and Giannis for showing us he's the most physically unique player. Super teams make for a great movie billboard and star-studded casting list, but they never turn into that long of a movie. Packers are on the same doorstep as the Bucks are to win a championship, the only difference is Giannis works hard to win while Rodgers is working hard to get out of Green Bay. Plus, Colin hands out his NBA Finals Report Cards!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
